hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -xe
echo $LINUX_VECTORCAST_DIR VCTOOLS_PACKAGE=`find /mnt/nfs/shared/Jenkins_Harvester/Linux -maxdepth 1 -name *.tgz` #VCTOOLS_PACKAGE=`find /mnt/nfs/shared/1_14_dispatcher_fix -maxdepth 1 -name *.tgz` export BOOST_DIR="/mnt/nfs/TOOLS/boost-1.53.0"
if [ -f $VCTOOLS_PACKAGE ];then tar xvzf $VCTOOLS_PACKAGE cd release ./install.sh cd .. else echo "VcTools package not available in $VCTOOLS_PACKAGE" exit 1 fi
artifact=("Metrics Collected" "successful for" "failed for") _expected=("Passed" "Failed" "Failed due to lesser artifact") _result=${_expected[0]} _threshold=4800
#function to handle error handle_error() { export _error_=$? if [ ! "$_error_" == "0" ];then echo " Command failed " export _RETURN_CODE_=$_error_ fi }
#global variable to hold variable _var_="--" #function to generate tabular file Extract() {
output=`grep "user" $1 | awk '{printf("%s",$2)}'` grep "user" $1 | awk '{printf(" %s ",$2)}'>>$summary_file if [ ! -z "$4" ] && [ ! -z "$5" ] then _var_=`grep "$5" $4 | grep -o '[0-9]\+'` if [ "$5" == "${artifact[1]}" ] then if [ "$_var_" -ge "$_threshold" ] then _result=${_expected[0]} else _result=${_expected[1]} fi fi fi echo -n -e " $_var_ " >>$summary_file _var_="--" out=`echo $output | awk '{split ($0,a,"m");print a[1]}'` if [ $out -ge $2 ] && [ $out -le $3 ] then echo -n -e " Passed ">>$summary_file else echo -n -e " Failed ">>$summary_file fi echo $_result >>$summary_file
} #secondary function to help generate Extract format Extract2() { if [ ! "$2" == "vcdb_getfiles.out.txt" ] then _var_=`cat $2 | wc -l` else _var_=`cat $2 | wc -l` fi Extract $1 $3 $4 }
#Set up Environment varaibles export VECTORCAST_DIR=${LINUX_VECTORCAST_DIR} export VECTOR_LICENSE_FILE=/home/vectorindia/vector-license/vector-VECTORINDIA.lic export PYTHONPATH=/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages:PYTHONPATH
#Print tools version in console for reference $VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell --version $VECTORCAST_DIR/clicast --version
#Copy the firefox source cp -r /home/vectorindia/firefox/* $WORKSPACE/.
#timing constant vcshelltime=45
. ./make_config
#print date echo $(date) >>$summary_file >>sol.txt
#print VcTools version in log file echo "---- Results for VcTools Version : ` $VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell --version | grep Version | awk '{print $3}'` " >> $summary_file >> sol.txt echo >> $summary_file
#tabular format for the file echo -e "Command \t Time \t Artifact \t TimmingResult \t ArtiResult " >>summary.txt >> sol.txt
#commenting for experiments
#Execute and measure timings for vcshell make -j8 echo -n -e "VchellMake-j4 \t">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell --db=pristine_vcshell.db make -j4 >vcshell_make.out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcshell_make || handle_error Extract vcshell_make $vcshelltime `expr $vcshelltime + 30`
#Execute and measure timings for vcshell metrics -j8 make clean echo -n -e "VcshellMetrics-j4\t">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell --flags="-include=1,-f=1,-std=gnu++0x,-m=1,-W=1" --metrics make -j4 >vcshell_metrics.out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcshell_metrics || handle_error Extract vcshell_metrics `expr $vcshelltime + 55` `expr $vcshelltime + 100` vcshell_metrics.out.txt "${artifact[0]}"
#Execute and mesaure timings for getmetrics echo -n -e "VcdbGetmetrics\t">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb getmetrics > vcdb_getmetrics_for_vcshell_metrics.out.txt 2>&1) 2>>vcdb_getmetrics || handle_error Extract2 vcdb_getmetrics vcdb_getmetrics_for_vcshell_metrics.out.txt 0 1
#Execute and measure timings for clearmetrics cp vcshell.db vcutil_metrics.db echo -n -e "VcdbClearmetrics">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb clearmetrics --db=vcutil_metrics.db > vcdb_clearmetrics.out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcdb_clearmetrics || handle_error Extract vcdb_clearmetrics 0 1
#Execute and measure timings for vcutil addmetrics echo -n -e "VcutilAddmetrics">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcutil --db=vcutil_metrics.db --flags="-include=1,-f=1,-std=gnu++0x,-m=1,-W=1" --all addmetrics > vcutil_addmetrics.out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcutil_addmetrics || handle_error Extract vcutil_addmetrics `expr $vcshelltime + 90` `expr $vcshelltime + 130` vcutil_addmetrics.out.txt "${artifact[0]}" || handle_error
#Verify metrics recorded in vcutil echo -n -e "VcdbGetmetrics\t">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb getmetrics > vcdb_getmetrics_for_vcshell_metrics.out.txt 2>&1) 2>>vcdb_getmetrics_vcutil || handle_error Extract2 vcdb_getmetrics_vcutil vcdb_getmetrics_for_vcshell_metrics.out.txt 0 1 || handle_error
#Vcutil Instrument echo -n -e "VcutilInstrument--jobs=4">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcutil --db=vcutil_metrics.db --flags="-include=1,-f=1,-std=gnu++0x,-m=1,-W=1" --all --jobs=4 --destination_dir=InstFiles --coverage_type=statement instrument > vcutil_instr.out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcutil_instrument || handle_error Extract vcutil_instrument `expr $vcshelltime + 50` `expr $vcshelltime + 130` vcutil_instr.out.txt "${artifact[1]}"
#Vcutil Quick parse echo -n -e "VcutilQikparse--jobs=4">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcutil --db=vcutil_metrics.db --flags="-include=1,-f=1,-std=gnu++0x,-m=1,-W=1" --all --jobs=4 --destination_dir=Quick quickparse > vcutil_quick.out 2>&1) 2>> vcutil_qikparse || handle_error Extract vcutil_qikparse `expr $vcshelltime + 5` `expr $vcshelltime + 45` vcutil_quick.out "${artifact[1]}"
#Vcutil Instrument with pristine echo -n -e "VcutilInspristine--jobs=4">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcutil --db=pristine_vcshell.db --flags="-include=1,-f=1,-std=gnu++0x,-m=1,-W=1" --all --jobs=4 --destination_dir=InstFiles --coverage_type=statement instrument > vcutil_instr.out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcutil_instrument || handle_error Extract vcutil_instrument `expr $vcshelltime + 50` `expr $vcshelltime + 130` vcutil_instr.out.txt "${artifact[1]}"
#Vcutil Quick parse with pristine echo -n -e "VcutilQikpristine--jobs=4">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcutil --db=pristine_vcshell.db --flags="-include=1,-f=1,-std=gnu++0x,-m=1,-W=1" --all --jobs=4 --destination_dir=Quick quickparse > vcutil_quick.out 2>&1) 2>> vcutil_qikparse || handle_error Extract vcutil_qikparse `expr $vcshelltime + 5` `expr $vcshelltime + 45` vcutil_quick.out "${artifact[1]}"
#vcdb getfiles echo -n -e "VcdbGetfiles\t">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb getfiles --db=pristine_vcshell.db >vcdb_getfiles.out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcdb__getfiles || handle_error Extract2 vcdb__getfiles vcdb_getfiles.out.txt 0 1
#vcdb dumpcmd echo -n -e "VcdbDumpcmd\t">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb dumpcommands --db=pristine_vcshell.db >vcdb_dumpcommand.out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcdb_dump || handle_error Extract vcdb_dump 0 1
#vcdb dumpverb echo -n -e "VcdbDumpverb\t">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb dumpverbs --db=pristine_vcshell.db > vcdb_dumpverbs.out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcdb_dumpv || handle_error Extract vcdb_dumpv 0 1
#vcdb getapps echo -n -e "VcdbGetapps\t">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb getapps --db=pristine_vcshell.db >vcdb_getapps.out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcdb_getapps || handle_error Extract vcdb_getapps 0 1
#get commentdata echo -n -e "VcdbGetcommentdata">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb getcommentdata --db=pristine_vcshell.db > vcdb_getcommentdata.out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcdb_getcommentdata || handle_error Extract vcdb_getcommentdata 0 1
#get vcdb metrics echo -n -e "VcdbGetmetrics\t">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb getmetrics > vcdb_getmetrics_data.out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcdb_met || handle_error Extract vcdb_met 0 1
#get vcdb path echo -n -e "VcdbGetpaths\t">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb getpaths --db=pristine_vcshell.db > vcdb_getpaths_data.out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcdb_getpath || handle_error Extract vcdb_getpath 0 1
#get vcdb tags echo -n -e "VcdbGettags\t">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb gettags --db=pristine_vcshell.db > vcdb_gettags_data.out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcdb_gettags || handle_error Extract vcdb_gettags 0 1
#get linkcmd echo -n -e "VcdbGetlinkcmd\t">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb getlinkcmd --db=pristine_vcshell.db > vcdb_getlinkcmd_data.out.txt 2>&1) 2>>vcdb_getlinkcmd || handle_error Extract vcdb_getlinkcmd 0 1
#get list echo -n -e "VcdbList-prefixes">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb list-prefixes --db=pristine_vcshell.db > vcdb_list-prefixes_data.out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcdb_getlist || handle_error Extract vcdb_getlist 0 1
#getcmd.sh echo -n -e "Getcmd.sh\t">>$summary_file chmod +x ../../getcmd.sh time (../.././getcmd.sh vcdb_getfiles.out.txt > getcommands_data.out.txt 2>&1) 2>> getcmd || handle_error Extract getcmd 1 3
#getcommentdensity echo -n -e "GetcommentDensity.sh">>$summary_file chmod +x ../../getcommentdensity.sh time (../.././getcommentdensity.sh vcdb_getfiles.out.txt > get_commentdensit_out.txt 2>&1) 2>> getcomment || handle_error Extract getcomment 2 4
#getincludes echo -n -e "Getincludes.sh\t">>$summary_file chmod +x ../../getincludes.sh time (../.././getincludes.sh vcdb_getfiles.out.txt > get_includes_out.txt 2>&1) 2>>vcdb_getinclude || handle_error Extract vcdb_getinclude 0 1
#getdefines echo -n -e "Getdefines.sh\t">>$summary_file chmod +x ../../getdefines.sh time (../.././getdefines.sh vcdb_getfiles.out.txt > get_defines_out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcdb_getdefine || handle_error Extract vcdb_getdefine 0 1
#getoptions echo -n -e "Getoptions.sh\t">>$summary_file chmod +x ../../getoption.sh || handle_error time (../.././getoption.sh vcdb_getfiles.out.txt > get_options_out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcdb_getoption || handle_error Extract vcdb_getoption 0 3
#getpopt echo -n -e "Getpoptions.sh\t">>$summary_file chmod +x ../../getppopt.sh || handle_error time (../.././getppopt.sh vcdb_getfiles.out.txt >get_poptions_out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcdb_getpoption || handle_error Extract vcdb_getpoption 2 4
#getuniindex echo -n -e "Getunitindex.sh\t">>$summary_file chmod +x ../../getunitindex.sh || handle_error time (../.././getunitindex.sh vcdb_getfiles.out.txt >get_unitindex_out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcdb_getunitindex || handle_error Extract vcdb_getunitindex 0 1
#getpathtype echo -n -e "GetPathtype.sh\t">>$summary_file chmod +x ../../getpathtype || handle_error time (../.././getpathtype.sh vcdb_getfiles.out.txt >get_pathtypes_out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcdb_getpathtype || handle_error Extract vcdb_getpathtype 0 1
#setpathtype echo -n -e "Setpathtype.sh\t">>$summary_file chmod +x ../../setpathtype.sh || handle_error time (../.././setpathtype.sh vcdb_getfiles.out.txt > set_pathtypes_out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcdb_setpathtype || true Extract vcdb_setpathtype 0 1
#Getallcmdlines echo -n -e "Getallcmdlines\t">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb getallcmdlines > vcdb_getcommandlines.out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcdb_getallcommandlines || handle_error Extract vcdb_getallcommandlines 0 1
#rename the vcshell.db mv vcshell.db old.db
#putcommand echo -n -e "putcommand\t">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcshell putcommand --inputcmds=vcdb_getcommandlines.out.txt > vcdb_getcommandlines.out.txt 2>&1) 2>>vcshell_putcommand || handle_error Extract vcshell_putcommand 2 4
#Getallcmdlines for new db echo -n -e "Getallcmdlines\t">>$summary_file time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcdb getallcmdlines > vcdb_getnewcommandlines.out.txt 2>&1) 2>> vcdb_getnewallcommandlines || handle_error Extract vcdb_getnewallcommandlines 0 1
#finding differnece diff vcdb_getcommandlines.out.txt vcdb_getnewcommandlines.out.txt > diff.txt || handle_error
#taking 1000 files head -1000 vcdb_getfiles.out.txt > first1000.txt || handle_error echo -n -e "qikparse1000\t">>$summary_file || handle_error time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcutil --db=vcutil_metrics.db --flags="-include=1,-f=1,-std=gnu++0x,-m=1,-W=1" --filelist=first1000.txt --jobs=4 --destination_dir=Quick quickparse > vcutil_quick1.out 2>&1) 2>> vcutil_qikparse1 || handle_error Extract vcutil_qikparse1 `expr $vcshelltime + 5` `expr $vcshelltime + 45` vcutil_quick1.out "${artifact[1]}" || handle_error
#next 1000 files sed -n -e '1001,2000p' vcdb_getfiles.out.txt > second.txt || handle_error echo -n -e "qikparse2000\t">>$summary_file || handle_error time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcutil --db=vcutil_metrics.db --flags="-include=1,-f=1,-std=gnu++0x,-m=1,-W=1" --filelist=second.txt --jobs=4 --destination_dir=Quick quickparse > vcutil_quick2.out 2>&1) 2>> vcutil_qikparse2 || handle_error Extract vcutil_qikparse2 `expr $vcshelltime + 5` `expr $vcshelltime + 45` vcutil_quick2.out "${artifact[1]}" || handle_error
#next 1000 files sed -n -e '2001,3000p' vcdb_getfiles.out.txt > third.txt || handle_error echo -n -e "qikparse3000\t">>$summary_file || handle_error time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcutil --db=vcutil_metrics.db --flags="-include=1,-f=1,-std=gnu++0x,-m=1,-W=1" --filelist=third.txt --jobs=4 --destination_dir=Quick quickparse > vcutil_quick3.out 2>&1) 2>> vcutil_qikparse3 || handle_error Extract vcutil_qikparse3 `expr $vcshelltime + 5` `expr $vcshelltime + 45` vcutil_quick3.out "${artifact[1]}" || handle_error
#next 1000 files sed -n -e '3001,4000p' vcdb_getfiles.out.txt > fourth.txt || handle_error echo -n -e "qikparse4000\t">>$summary_file || handle_error time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcutil --db=vcutil_metrics.db --flags="-include=1,-f=1,-std=gnu++0x,-m=1,-W=1" --filelist=fourth.txt --jobs=4 --destination_dir=Quick quickparse > vcutil_quick4.out 2>&1) 2>> vcutil_qikparse4 || handle_error Extract vcutil_qikparse4 `expr $vcshelltime + 5` `expr $vcshelltime + 45` vcutil_quick4.out "${artifact[1]}" || handle_error
#next 1000 files sed -n -e '4001,5000p' vcdb_getfiles.out.txt > fif.txt || handle_error echo -n -e "qikparse5000\t">>$summary_file || handle_error time ($VECTORCAST_DIR/vcutil --db=vcutil_metrics.db --flags="-include=1,-f=1,-std=gnu++0x,-m=1,-W=1" --filelist=third.txt --jobs=4 --destination_dir=Quick quickparse > vcutil_quick5.out 2>&1) 2>> vcutil_qikparse5 || handle_error Extract vcutil_qikparse5 `expr $vcshelltime + 5` `expr $vcshelltime + 45` vcutil_quick5.out "${artifact[1]}" || handle_error
#parsing summary.txt to get the fail
if ! grep "Failed" $summary_file >> sol.txt then echo "NO FAILURE FOUND" >> sol.txt fi
(column -t $summary_file) > temp.txt || handle_error rm -rf $summary_file || handle_error cp temp.txt $summary_file || handle_error #quick #Archive the artifacts cd $top_level_archive_dir archive_dir=$(date +%d) if [ -d $archive_dir ];then rm -rf $archive_dir fi mkdir $archive_dir cp $WORKSPACE/mozilla-release/obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/summary.txt $archive_dir/. cp $WORKSPACE/mozilla-release/obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/*.out.txt $archive_dir/. cp $WORKSPACE/mozilla-release/obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/sol.txt $archive_dir/. exit /b $_RETURN_CODE_
